8.5.4. Communication Safety Example


Up: Motivating Examples Next: Library Example #1 Previous: (Approximate) Current Practice #3

The following example (Communication Safety Example) is meant to illustrate ``safety'' between point-to-point and collective communication. MPI guarantees that a single communicator can do safe point-to-point and collective communication.
Example
